name: Mancala - Deluxe HD
description:
Mancala, the centuries old game of collecting gemstones, is one of the world’s oldest board games.

It is sometimes called "sowing" games, or "count-and-capture" games, which describes the game-play. Mancala games play a role in many African and some Asian societies comparable to that of chess in the West, or the game of Go in Eastern Asia.


Features:

1. Three levels of play, meeting needs of all players.

2. Play against a nearby player via Bluetooth or your friend on the same device with Two Players mode.

3. Enable to save game progress and load it next time.

4. Free to choose seed number(3-6).

5. Great visual effect and exciting sound effects.

6. Retina display high resolution.



Rules:

Except for sowing games,count and capture, this old board game also has many other names, such as kalah,oware,endodoi,awale and wari.

In this game, players begin by placing a certain number of seeds in each of the pits on the game board. Players take turns to sow. In the process of sowing, all the seeds from a hole are dropped one-by-one into subsequent holes in a motion wrapping around the board. When one player no longer has any seed in his holes, the game ends. The player with the most seeds in designated hole wins the game.
